# tk-qr-code

## Properties

| Property             | Attribute | Description                             | Type     | Default     |
| -------------------- | --------- | --------------------------------------- | -------- | ----------- |
| `alt` _(required)_   | `alt`     | Alternative text for image.             | `string` | `undefined` |
| `size`               | `size`    | Size (in pixels) of the qr code.        | `number` | `100`       |
| `value` _(required)_ | `value`   | Value to be encoded within the qr code. | `string` | `undefined` |
